meanings.definition: A drug used to treat gout by increasing the excretion of uric acid in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed probenecids to help with my gout.
meanings.sent2: Patients with gout often take probenecids to manage their condition.
meanings.sent3: After taking probenecids, I felt like my gout was on vacation!
meanings.sent4: Probenecids acted like a janitor, sweeping away the uric acid from my body.
meanings.sent5: The probenecids flushed out the uric acid like a powerful waterfall.
